name: Keep Franko Alive
description:
This mini-game is my entry for Ludum Dare 46 with theme "Keep It Alive".

Take on the role of Dr. Jonathan, a scientist of monsterology and allow yourself to revive scary monster. Reviving monsters is no easy thing, especially when it comes to Dr. Jonathan's ultimate creation Franko.

For how long can you Keep Franko Alive?

Sounds, music and pixel art pieces in the game are created by myself. But the game was developed in Godot Engine. To satisfy the license terms I provide a link to the engine's license.

I have also used BitPotion font.
